tuv.seg: My favorite part about caring for the environment is that it encourages the D.I.Y. spirit.
关于环保，我最喜欢的部分是它宣扬了一种DIY的理念。

I've always been a little on the crafty side and am more than happy to make something myself if it means that I'll save money and help out the planet by reducing my own consumption of chemical-infused products that are also often times packaging nightmares.
对此，我时常灵光闪现，而且手工制作除了让我感到开心外，更让我有成就感的是，我不但省了钱还减少了自身对有害化学品的消耗。
